title: Jason Mazzola from Count Me Out, Cloak/Dagger and Where It Went Podcast
itunes:title: Jason Mazzola from Count Me Out, Cloak/Dagger and Where It Went Podcast
description:
We have an absolute treat this week with the appearance of my friend Jason Mazzola on the podcast. He sang for a band called Count Me Out, currently sings for a band called Cloak/Dagger as well as the host of Where It Went Podcast (a deep dive into the Revelation Records catalog). As you can see, he's a busy dude but we found time to hang hard and discuss what it's like being podcast nerds, how amazing Chain of Strength is and trying to not be overly nostalgic. 

ORDER THE NEW CLOAK/DAGGER 7" HERE

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts and Ray Harkins
